about_the_game:
"Jumping in the middle of the sky" is an exciting 3D platformer that challenges your skills and reflexes as you control a sphere through obstacle-filled levels. Immerse yourself in an adrenaline-filled adventure as you jump from platform to platform and face increasingly difficult challenges.

With intuitive controls and fluid gameplay, each jump requires perfect precision and timing to overcome obstacles and advance to the next level. From dizzying cliffs to unexpected turns, each level presents new challenges that will test your skill and reaction capacity.

But beware! With only 10 lives to complete the 30 challenging levels, every mistake can be fatal. Master the art of jumping, as you immerse yourself in a world of danger and excitement.

Do you have what it takes to conquer the different levels and reach the end? Find out in "Jumping in the middle of the sky"!

With intuitive controls and fluid gameplay, each jump requires perfect precision and timing to overcome obstacles and advance to the next level. From dizzying cliffs to unexpected turns, each level presents new challenges that will test your skill and reaction capacity.

But beware! With only 10 lives to complete the 30 challenging levels, every mistake can be fatal. Master the art of jumping, as you immerse yourself in a world of danger and excitement.

Do you have what it takes to conquer the different levels and reach the end? Find out in "Jumping in the middle of the sky"!
